price: Hindi ba ninyo napag-alaman kung papaanong lumikha si Allāh ng pitong langit na nagkakatakluban?
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَوۡاْ كَيۡفَ خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ سَبۡعَ سَمَٰوَٰتٖ طِبَاقٗا

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: alam taraw kayfa khalaqa al-lahu sabʿa samāwātin ṭibāqan
